description:
Lightweight, moisture wicking and comfortable, the ODLO Essentials print t-shirt is a short sleeve, technical tee crafted for warm weather running. Breathable and fast drying, the t-shirt is made from 67 per cent double-knit recycled polyester and is finished with reflective details and ZeroScent - a bio-based antimicrobial treatment that keeps scents at bay, even after repeat runs. Comes in our standard fit. Suited to a range of high heart rate activities. A multifunction t-shirt made for regular running.

Why we made it: Running, Training
name: Odlo Essential Print Crew Neck SS - Mens

specs.value: The regular fit is a bit looser with a straight cut
